EditTextPreference.android:title: Refresh rate
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Interval for sending data to multiwii in milliseconds. Bluetooth minimum: 40. Wifi minimum: 20

EditTextPreference.android:title: Low Signal threshold
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Beep when signal under this level

EditTextPreference.android:title: Throttle resolution
EditTextPreference.android:summary: How much the throttle increases or increases with each step

EditTextPreference.android:title: Sensor Filter
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The amount of smoothing of the accelerometer between 0 and 1. A lower value means more smoothing. -1 to cancel

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Debug Text
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable to see roll/pitch/yaw/magnetic orientation on screen

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Use Camera
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enables viewing camera video if it is connected to port 8080.

EditTextPreference.android:summary: (Optional) Enter the network address also known as SSID to automatically connect to it.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Prevent Exit when flying
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Disables the back button when throttle is 1100 or above.
